    • Class gameActions.Control extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • startGame

          boolean startGame
          When start screen is showing Paint checks this variable for whether or not draw the start screen

        • playing

          boolean playing
          When game is being played Paint checks this variable for whether or not draw playing field

        • paused

          boolean paused
          When game is paused Paint checks this variable for whether or not draw the pause screen

        • endGame

          boolean endGame
          When end screen is showing Paint checks this variable for whether or not draw the game over screen

        • nameEnter

          boolean nameEnter
          When entering name screen is showing Paint checks this variable for whether or not draw the enter name screen

        • highScores

          boolean highScores
          When high scores are listed on screen Paint checks this variable for whether or not draw the high score screen

          int[] keyMap
